availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Philips Dean in Mercer County, Kentucky on March 10, 1845. Father of John Dean, James Dean, William Dean,Job Dean, Milton Dean, Albert Dean, and Norton Dean. Farmer in Mercer County, Kentucky in 1850. Laborer in Frankfort, Kentucky in 1860. Fined for selling liquor without a license in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer, District 2, p. 312A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin, Frankfort, p. 278.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin, Market House, p. 171B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film #000191859.
